subtitle: A French recipe for a country chicken casserole.

method.text: Season the chicken. Heat the butter in a large saucepan. Add the chicken pieces and cook for 8-10 min until golden brown, turning frequently. Brown thighs and legs for longer than breast.
Remove chicken from the pan. Place in an ovenproof dish and cook in the oven for 1 hour.
Meanwhile, add shallots to the hot pan. Cook gently without colouring for 1-2 min. Add sliced mushrooms and cook for 2 min.
Drain off the fat from pan. Add white wine and reduce mixture by half. Add the brown sauce and diced tomato flesh. Simmer for 5 min. Season to taste.
Pour sauce over the cooked chicken pieces. Sprinkle the chopped tarragon over the casserole and serve.

title: Chicken chasseur
